definition: to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
variant of 玩意兒|玩意儿[wan2 yi4 r5]

sentences.english: SCAD diving was just what David needed — it was definitely terrifying.
sentences.chinese: SCAD跳正是大卫所需要的，这玩艺绝对可怕。

sentences.english: That's probably why they bought this junker to just start working on it.
sentences.chinese: 这可能就是为什么他们要买这一破玩艺儿，作为开端。
他们认为那玩艺儿有帮助吗？

sentences.english: P. S. Just wait a few days, there's a bit of awesomeness coming up.
sentences.chinese: 再等几天，有点牛逼的玩艺就要来了。

sentences.english: Many people sell souvenirs in the street during Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 春节期间，街上有很多卖小玩艺儿的。
赌博这玩艺儿，你可不行。

sentences.english: Dante: That's just a piece of crap.
What IDEs have support for the Hack Language?
sentences.chinese: 什么玩艺有黑客语言支持？

sentences.english: This spare room will be used later to install extra toys.
sentences.chinese: 空余的空间稍后将用于安装其它“小玩艺儿”。

sentences.english: The gang members are playing a cat-and mouse game.
sentences.chinese: 帮派人员在玩弄斗智施暴的玩艺儿。

sentences.english: I want to make a clean sweep of everything I've learnt and start afresh.
sentences.chinese: 我要和以前学的那些玩艺儿一刀两断，一切从头开始。

sentences.english: Many people sell souvenirs in the street during the Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 春节期间，街上有很多卖小玩艺儿的。

sentences.english: A self-employed jobber, he was always building things out of odds and ends.
sentences.chinese: 他是个体手艺人，总是用零星东西做些小玩艺儿。

sentences.english: Never in my dreams did I imagine any hole could be so disgusting.
sentences.chinese: 在我作梦的时候都见不到这样丑恶的玩艺。

sentences.english: The play thing, compared to bare rushes propagandizes Sichuan male that also disgusting.
sentences.chinese: 嘛玩艺，比裸奔宣传四川那男的还恶心。

definition: variant of 玩意兒|玩意儿[wan2 yi4 r5]
erhua variant of 玩意[wan2 yi4]
toy/plaything/thing/act/trick (in a performance, stage show, acrobatics etc)
a couple of times/to repeat the same/the same old trick/tricks of the trade
to fool/to deceive/to go through the motions
see 西洋鏡|西洋镜[xi1 yang2 jing4]
